website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding refresh of the Lex Luthor LEGO set, kids will enjoy this challenging build and top-notch play possibilities.
pros: Lex Luthor’s mech is one of the most popular LEGO builds in the DC Heroes line, if not the entire LEGO line: It’s a fun challenge for kids to build, especially with articulated limbs that hold their pose without collapsing
New mini figures round out the set – including Batman with jetpack, Firestorm, Wonder Woman, and more
cons: Younger kids will need help from parents to build this kit
Tiny stud shooter projectiles are just begging to be lost

customer_reviews.title: Facinated my Nephew
customer_reviews.text: My Nephew is into Lego's, he was fascinated by this and spent his Christmas afternoon putting it together. Now he has it proudly displayed on his favorite Lego shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Possibly The Best DC Set I Own!
customer_reviews.text: This set was awesome. The real highlight is the Lex Luthor Mec. It has movable arms and hands, escape pod, and movable legs. Also included is a Batman winged jetpack. Lastly is the awesome selection of new minifigures! I really liked how Batman and Wonder Women have a retro/new type of look. Overall I would highly recommend this awesome set!
customer_reviews.author: Saifullah

customer_reviews.title: Real Legos. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. My son loves it and it comes with all of Firestorm’s accessories. Better value to get this set than buying Firestorm separately.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman fan
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, my daughter loved putting this set together. Especially loved the inclusion of Wonder Woman.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great set, cool looking mech, lots of useful Lego parts
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly cool-looking mech. Fun to build, and a real treasure of parts if you're into building Lego models that require moving parts.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my grandson. He is a Lego fanatic.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second favorite LEGO mech yet
customer_reviews.text: Second favorite LEGO mech yet, only surpassed by the amazing THE LEGO BATMAN MOVIE - EGGHEAD MECH. The Batman glider could use a little more design work but the minifigures collection is tops.
customer_reviews.author: KG Kildare

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons loved this LEGO pack
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for my grandsons (ages 4 and 7) and myself!! We LOVE putting these together.
customer_reviews.author: Jan VanScoy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Sweet
customer_reviews.text: My kids like it almost as much as my husband does.
customer_reviews.author: Ccsharp

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loved it. Built it all day himself
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good DC LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: Good LEGO set for my son. Lots of characters in the set as well!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: how any peaces it has
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything it made a really nice addition to my collection
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: it doesnt fit on my finger
customer_reviews.text: this ring isnt big enough and its not even real gold its a SCAM!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alaa Abouseif

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. The mech, for its size, holds up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: houseplant.hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: ... it - the appeal here is definitely those five awesome minifigures! I especially like that we have several ...
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it - the appeal here is definitely those five awesome minifigures! I especially like that we have several female characters that my daughter loved to play with (especially Wonder Woman, of course). The set is fairly easy to construct and then quite fun to play with. Of note is that the mech shoots very tiny weapons that will be instantly lost, especially in any kind of carpet. I wish Lego would stick with larger projectiles because these are just waiting to be stepped on or eaten by the dog when we can't find them. But in all, a great set with a cool set of figures that make for great play scenarios.
customer_reviews.author: Talvi

customer_reviews.title: Great project with your kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great project to work on with your kids. It took me several sittings with my 6 year old to get this finished. It is a big project but using the instructions you can break it into at least three sittings because they have separate bags of legos for separate sections of this project. It is really cool looking when it is complete. There was nothing difficult about building this. It was simply time consuming. I would highly recommend this to any legomaniac or just any parent who wants to bond with their kid over a big lego project.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah L. Olson

customer_reviews.title: It's good!
customer_reviews.text: My son, Cole, likes the big mech the best. The mini-figures are good, as is the bat pack. It was difficult to build, but it took him ten or twenty minutes to build. Sometimes the big mech is hard to control, so it's not as much fun to play with. Everything was labeled well, and he had no problem following the directions. He would recommend it to others who like and enjoy LEGO'S
customer_reviews.author: Tim Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great set - also a perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: We love legos in our house! This set is a lot of fun to play with. As expected, the instructions were clear and easy to follow , no missing pieces, and great quality. My boys love this.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes Lex Luther Mech Takedown Bldg Kit (406 Pieces)
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift to my grandchild who loves LEGO building sets. Very happy with this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Dickki

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A really fun Lego kit. Kids of a certain age cannot get enough of these. An excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bushman

product_meta.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes Lex Luthor Mech Takedown 76097 Building Kit (406 Piece)
product_meta.description: Team up with the Justice League heroes to grab the Energy Infuser back from Cheetah, with this LEGO DC Super Heroes 76097 Lex Luthor Mech Takedown set. The buildable mech features an opening minifigure cockpit/escape pod, adjustable 6-stud rapid shooter and attachment points for 3 collectible Energy Infusers. This Justice League toy for boys and girls also includes Batman’s Bat-Glider with 2 stud shooters, the buildable green Energy Infuser, 5 minifigures, plus assorted translucent-orange Power Burst elements to customize your builds and minifigures.
feature_bullets: Build the Lex Luthor Mech, with an escape pod, rapid shooter and buildable battle axe, and Bat-Glider with stud shooter, then team up with the Justice League against villains of the DC universe
Includes a Lex Luthor figure, Batman figure (in Rebirth Batsuit), Wonder Woman figure, Firestorm figure and Cheetah figure with weapons and Power Burst elements

Lex Luthor mech model measures over 7” (19cm) high, 1” (5cm) long and 4” (12cm) wide Escape pod measures over 2” (6cm) high, 1” (4cm) long and 1” (4cm) wide Bat-Glider measures over 2” (6cm) high, 1” (3cm) long and 4” (12cm) wide
406 pieces – Mech toy for boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 14

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars103 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
